# VERS√ÉO INCOMPLETA

```{r, p01, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
ms170717 <- read.table(file="http://www.anbima.com.br/merc_sec/arqs/ms170717.txt", 
                       header=TRUE,
                       sep="@", 
                       skip=1);


base <- ms170717;
colnames(base) <- gsub(pattern="\\.", replacement="", x=colnames(base) );
colnames(base);
head(base);
write.csv2(x=base, file="ms170717.csv");
```
